capabilities.title: Memory Pressure
capabilities.description: Check current system memory pressure level

capabilities.title: Virtual Memory Stats
capabilities.description: Show virtual memory statistics including page faults and swap usage

capabilities.title: Top CPU Processes
capabilities.description: Snapshot of top processes sorted by CPU usage

capabilities.title: Top Memory Processes
capabilities.description: Snapshot of top processes sorted by memory usage

capabilities.title: Disk Free Space
capabilities.description: Show disk usage and free space for all mounted volumes

capabilities.title: macOS Version
capabilities.description: Show macOS version information

capabilities.title: Hardware Overview
capabilities.description: Detailed hardware information including CPU, memory, and serial number

capabilities.title: Storage Information
capabilities.description: Detailed storage device and volume information

capabilities.title: CPU Information
capabilities.description: Show CPU architecture, core count, and model

capabilities.title: System Uptime
capabilities.description: Show how long the system has been running

capabilities.title: Battery Status
capabilities.description: Show battery charge level and power source

capabilities.title: SIP Status
capabilities.description: Check System Integrity Protection status

capabilities.title: Gatekeeper Status
capabilities.description: Check Gatekeeper security status

capabilities.title: FileVault Status
capabilities.description: Check FileVault encryption status

capabilities.title: Network Interfaces
capabilities.description: List network hardware ports and their status

capabilities.title: Disk Partitions
capabilities.description: List all disks and their partition layout

capabilities.title: Swap Usage
capabilities.description: Show current swap memory usage

capabilities.title: Flush DNS Cache
capabilities.description: Clear the DNS resolver cache to fix DNS resolution issues

uiHints.confirmText: This will flush the DNS cache and restart mDNSResponder. Network connections may briefly pause.

capabilities.title: Purge Inactive Memory
capabilities.description: Free up inactive memory by purging the disk cache

uiHints.confirmText: This will purge inactive memory. The system may briefly slow down as caches are rebuilt.

capabilities.title: Sync & Purge Memory
capabilities.description: Flush file system buffers to disk and then purge inactive memory

uiHints.confirmText: This will sync file system buffers and purge inactive memory.

capabilities.title: Restart Finder
capabilities.description: Restart the Finder application to resolve display or file browsing issues

uiHints.confirmText: Finder will restart. Open Finder windows will close briefly.

capabilities.title: Restart Dock
capabilities.description: Restart the Dock to resolve visual glitches or unresponsive behavior

uiHints.confirmText: The Dock will restart. It will briefly disappear and reappear.

capabilities.title: Restart Menu Bar
capabilities.description: Restart SystemUIServer to fix menu bar glitches

uiHints.confirmText: The menu bar will restart briefly. Some menu extras may reload.

capabilities.title: Restart Control Center
capabilities.description: Restart Control Center to fix unresponsive controls

uiHints.confirmText: Control Center will restart. It will briefly become unavailable.

capabilities.title: Restart Audio Service
capabilities.description: Restart coreaudiod to fix audio issues

uiHints.confirmText: The audio daemon will restart. Audio will cut out briefly.

capabilities.title: Reset Font Cache
capabilities.description: Clear font caches to fix font rendering issues

uiHints.confirmText: Font caches will be cleared. Fonts may render slowly until caches rebuild.

capabilities.title: Reset Quick Look
capabilities.description: Reset Quick Look caches and preview generators

capabilities.title: Spotlight Status
capabilities.description: Check the status of Spotlight indexing

capabilities.title: Clear User Caches
capabilities.description: Remove cached files from ~/Library/Caches (apps will rebuild as needed)

uiHints.confirmText: This will remove all files from ~/Library/Caches. Apps will rebuild their caches as needed.
uiHints.warningText: Close apps first for best results.

capabilities.title: Clear User Logs
capabilities.description: Remove log files from ~/Library/Logs

uiHints.confirmText: This will remove all log files from ~/Library/Logs.

capabilities.title: Clear Crash Reports
capabilities.description: Remove application crash reports

uiHints.confirmText: This will remove crash reports from ~/Library/Application Support/CrashReporter.

capabilities.title: Clear Saved App State
capabilities.description: Remove saved application states to free disk space

uiHints.confirmText: This will remove saved window positions and states for all apps. Apps will start fresh.

capabilities.title: Clear Xcode Derived Data
capabilities.description: Remove Xcode build artifacts to reclaim disk space

preflightChecks.message: DerivedData not found. Xcode may not be installed.

uiHints.confirmText: This will remove all Xcode build caches. Projects will need to rebuild.
uiHints.warningText: Close Xcode first for best results.

capabilities.title: Clear Xcode Archives
capabilities.description: Remove old Xcode build archives

uiHints.confirmText: This will permanently delete all Xcode archives. You cannot undo this.
uiHints.warningText: Archives contain signed app bundles needed for App Store submissions. Make sure you don't need them.

capabilities.title: Clear Simulator Caches
capabilities.description: Remove iOS/watchOS simulator caches

uiHints.confirmText: This will remove simulator caches. They will be rebuilt as needed.

capabilities.title: Delete Unavailable Simulators
capabilities.description: Remove simulator devices that are no longer available

preflightChecks.message: Xcode Command Line Tools not installed.

uiHints.confirmText: This will remove simulator devices for SDK versions no longer installed.

capabilities.title: Clear iOS Device Support
capabilities.description: Remove cached iOS device support files (re-downloaded on demand)

uiHints.confirmText: This will remove cached device support files. They will be re-downloaded when you connect a device.

capabilities.title: Clear CocoaPods Cache
capabilities.description: Remove CocoaPods download cache

uiHints.confirmText: This will remove CocoaPods download cache. Pods will be re-downloaded as needed.

capabilities.title: Clear Swift Package Manager Cache
capabilities.description: Remove SwiftPM resolved package cache

uiHints.confirmText: This will remove Swift Package Manager download cache.

capabilities.title: Clear npm Cache
capabilities.description: Clean the npm package cache

uiHints.confirmText: This will clean the npm download cache.

capabilities.title: Clear Yarn Cache
capabilities.description: Clean the Yarn package cache

uiHints.confirmText: This will clean the Yarn download cache.

capabilities.title: Homebrew Cleanup
capabilities.description: Remove old versions of installed formulae and clear download cache

uiHints.confirmText: This will remove old versions of Homebrew formulae and clear the download cache.

capabilities.title: Homebrew Autoremove
capabilities.description: Remove unused Homebrew dependencies

uiHints.confirmText: This will remove Homebrew formulae that are no longer needed as dependencies.

capabilities.title: Docker Disk Usage
capabilities.description: Show Docker disk usage breakdown

capabilities.title: Docker System Prune
capabilities.description: Remove unused Docker images, containers, and volumes

uiHints.confirmText: This will remove ALL unused Docker images, containers, networks, and volumes. This is irreversible.
uiHints.warningText: All stopped containers, unused images, and dangling volumes will be permanently deleted.

capabilities.title: Safari Tab Count
capabilities.description: Count open tabs across all Safari windows
capabilities.appleScript: tell application "Safari" to return count of tabs of every window

capabilities.title: Safari List Tabs
capabilities.description: List all open tab URLs in Safari
capabilities.appleScript:
tell application "Safari"
set urlList to {}
repeat with w in windows
repeat with t in tabs of w
set end of urlList to URL of t
end repeat
end repeat
return urlList
end tell

capabilities.title: Safari Close Tabs by Pattern
capabilities.description: Close Safari tabs matching a URL pattern
capabilities.appleScript:
tell application "Safari"
set targetPattern to "__PATTERN__"
repeat with w in windows
set tabList to tabs of w
repeat with t in tabList
if URL of t contains targetPattern then
close t
end if
end repeat
end repeat
end tell

uiHints.confirmText: This will close all Safari tabs whose URL contains the specified pattern.

capabilities.title: Safari Close All Tabs
capabilities.description: Close all tabs in all Safari windows
capabilities.appleScript:
tell application "Safari"
repeat with w in windows
try
tell w to close (tabs)
end try
end repeat
end tell

uiHints.confirmText: This will close ALL tabs in ALL Safari windows. This cannot be undone.
uiHints.warningText: All unsaved work in Safari tabs will be lost.

capabilities.title: Quit Safari
capabilities.description: Gracefully quit Safari
capabilities.appleScript: tell application "Safari" to quit

uiHints.confirmText: This will gracefully quit Safari.

capabilities.title: Chrome Tab Count
capabilities.description: Count open tabs across all Chrome windows
capabilities.appleScript:
tell application "Google Chrome"
set tabCount to 0
repeat with w in windows
set tabCount to tabCount + (count of tabs of w)
end repeat
return tabCount
end tell

capabilities.title: Chrome List Tabs
capabilities.description: List all open tab URLs in Chrome
capabilities.appleScript:
tell application "Google Chrome"
set urlList to {}
repeat with w in windows
repeat with t in tabs of w
set end of urlList to URL of t
end repeat
end repeat
return urlList
end tell

capabilities.title: Chrome Close Tabs by Pattern
capabilities.description: Close Chrome tabs matching a URL pattern
capabilities.appleScript:
tell application "Google Chrome"
set targetPattern to "__PATTERN__"
repeat with w in windows
set tabList to tabs of w
repeat with t in tabList
if URL of t contains targetPattern then
close t
end if
end repeat
end repeat
end tell

uiHints.confirmText: This will close all Chrome tabs whose URL contains the specified pattern.

capabilities.title: Chrome Close All Tabs
capabilities.description: Close all tabs in all Chrome windows
capabilities.appleScript:
tell application "Google Chrome"
repeat with w in windows
close tabs of w
end repeat
end tell

uiHints.confirmText: This will close ALL tabs in ALL Chrome windows. This cannot be undone.
uiHints.warningText: All unsaved work in Chrome tabs will be lost.

capabilities.title: Quit Chrome
capabilities.description: Gracefully quit Google Chrome
capabilities.appleScript: tell application "Google Chrome" to quit

uiHints.confirmText: This will gracefully quit Google Chrome.

capabilities.title: Clear Safari Cache
capabilities.description: Remove Safari browser cache files

uiHints.confirmText: This will clear Safari's browser cache. You may need to re-login to some sites.

capabilities.title: Clear Chrome Cache
capabilities.description: Remove Chrome browser cache files

uiHints.confirmText: This will clear Chrome's browser cache.

capabilities.title: Clear Edge Cache
capabilities.description: Remove Edge browser cache files

uiHints.confirmText: This will clear Edge's browser cache.

capabilities.title: Clear Brave Cache
capabilities.description: Remove Brave browser cache files

uiHints.confirmText: This will clear Brave's browser cache.

capabilities.title: Clear Firefox Cache
capabilities.description: Remove Firefox browser cache files

uiHints.confirmText: This will clear Firefox's browser cache.

capabilities.title: Clear Arc Cache
capabilities.description: Remove Arc browser cache files

uiHints.confirmText: This will clear Arc's browser cache.

capabilities.title: List Running Apps
capabilities.description: List all currently running GUI applications
capabilities.appleScript: tell application "System Events" to get name of (processes where background only is false)

capabilities.title: Listening Ports
capabilities.description: Show processes listening on TCP ports

capabilities.title: Large Files in Home
capabilities.description: Find files larger than 1GB in home directory

capabilities.title: Home Directory Usage
capabilities.description: Show disk usage breakdown of home directory folders

capabilities.title: Run Daily Maintenance
capabilities.description: Run macOS daily periodic maintenance scripts

uiHints.confirmText: This will run macOS daily maintenance tasks (log rotation, temporary file cleanup, etc.).

capabilities.title: Run All Maintenance
capabilities.description: Run macOS daily, weekly, and monthly periodic maintenance scripts

uiHints.confirmText: This will run all macOS periodic maintenance tasks. This may take several minutes.

capabilities.title: Empty Trash
capabilities.description: Empty the user Trash folder

uiHints.confirmText: This will permanently delete all items in the Trash. This cannot be undone.
uiHints.warningText: Files in Trash will be permanently deleted.
